MBPCloud - My Business Portal on Cloud

Published on 22 Mar 2024 by Suresh Babu

Empowering Businesses to Thrive: Harnessing the Transformative Potential of Cloud Technology

My role as a Senior Web Designer from January 2011 to July 2013 revolved around the development of MBPCloud, a revolutionary web portal offering businesses an office in the cloud. With a suite of tools ranging from bookings and contracts to mail automation and timesheet management, MBPCloud aimed to empower the business community to operate efficiently, compliantly, and successfully in the digital age.

My role as a Senior Web MBPCloud epitomized innovation in cloud-based business solutions, providing a comprehensive suite of tools to streamline operations and enhance productivity.

Innovative JavaScript Framework Development: A pivotal aspect of my role involved the development of a custom JavaScript framework driven by jQuery. This framework implemented cutting-edge features such as drag-and-drop functionality, user-based styling, responsive slideshows, and client-side form validations, enhancing user interactivity and usability.

By crafting a bespoke JavaScript framework, we revolutionized user interaction, empowering businesses with intuitive and dynamic features for enhanced productivity.

Promotion Websites and Minisites

In addition to core development, I led the creation of promotion websites and minisites, strategically designed to showcase each module of the MBPCloud product. These promotional assets played a crucial role in driving user engagement and adoption of the platform's diverse features.

Our promotion websites and minisites served as powerful marketing tools, effectively communicating the value proposition of each MBPCloud module to potential users.

Integration of Advanced Frontend Concepts: Collaborating closely with developers, I facilitated the implementation of advanced frontend concepts and features to maximize user experience. This involved integrating complex DOM structures in ASPX pages with user controls, emphasizing reusability and caching for optimal performance.

Through seamless integration of advanced frontend concepts, we enhanced MBPCloud's usability and performance, delivering a superior user experience across the platform.

Leadership and Team Management: As a senior member of the team, I managed a team of three designers, overseeing task delivery and ensuring adherence to project deadlines. This collaborative approach fostered a culture of innovation and excellence, driving the successful execution of MBPCloud's design initiatives.

"Through effective team management and collaboration, we successfully delivered on project milestones, driving innovation and excellence in MBPCloud's design landscape."
